entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Rain beginning this evening changing to periods of snow near midnight. Snow level 2500 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few rain showers or flurries. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to a few rain showers near noon. Periods of snow over higher terrain in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 2200 metres near noon. Snowfall amount 2 cm over higher terrain. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 9. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
